sn11.11:1.2: “Sakkassa, bhikkhave, devanamindassa pubbe manussabhutassa satta vatapadani samattani samadinnani ahesum, yesam samadinnatta sakko sakkattam ajjhaga.
sn11.11:1.8: yavajivam vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavaseyyam muttacago payatapani vossaggarato yacayogo danasamvibhagarato,
sn11.11:1.10: yavajivam akkodhano assam—sacepi me kodho uppajjeyya, khippameva nam pativineyyanti.
sn11.11:1.11: Sakkassa, bhikkhave, devanamindassa pubbe manussabhutassa imani satta vatapadani samattani samadinnani ahesum, yesam samadinnatta sakko sakkattam ajjhagati.
